attributes.action: #RefundUsNow- 15% Cash Refund for All UK University Students
attributes.additional_details: Studies have shown that online learning is 15% less effective than regular learning, it therefore makes sense that students should be paying less for a lesser service in their tuition fees. Universities have been lacking in not only their support offered for studies, but also for those having to self-isolate in university accommodations and beyond. It is not fair that students should pay full fee for a greatly reduced and inadequate service to what was originally offered to them.
attributes.background: RefundUsNow2020- Students have been majorly neglected by universities and offered a reduced service, therefore a 15% flat rate refund on tuition fees is necessary to better reflect the change in service.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
